reviews.name: Sarah Chen
reviews.text: The AI signals are incredibly accurate. Increased my win rate from 45% to 68% in just 3 months!

reviews.name: Michael Rodriguez
reviews.text: Best trading platform I have used. The risk management features saved me from major losses multiple times.

reviews.name: Alex Thompson
reviews.text: The API is robust and the backtesting features are top-notch. Perfect for testing strategies before going live.

items.question: How accurate are the AI trading signals?
items.answer: Our AI models achieve 70%+ directional accuracy across multiple timeframes and market conditions. We continuously train and improve our models using the latest data.

items.question: Is my capital safe?
items.answer: We never hold your funds. You maintain full custody of your assets on your exchange. We only execute trades through secure API connections with read and trade permissions.

items.question: Can I use my own strategies?
items.answer: Absolutely! Pro and Enterprise plans include custom strategy support. You can backtest and deploy your own algorithms alongside our AI signals.

items.question: What exchanges do you support?
items.answer: We currently support Binance, Coinbase Pro, Kraken, and Bybit. More exchanges are being added regularly based on user demand.
